alert.note: Alert for Chase (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:24PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Chase County through 215 PM MDT... At 123 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Champion, or 9 miles southwest of Imperial, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Champion, Crete, Chase, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area and Church Grove Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 41 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
